data.title: Roc Nation retains Redstone Partners to recruit Olivia Mittleman as Associate Director, Digital Marketing & Strategy - Redstone Partners
data.meta_description: NEW YORK, NY – July 2022   Olivia Mittleman joins Roc Nation as Associate Director,...
data.text:
Roc Nation retains Redstone Partners to recruit Olivia Mittleman as Associate Director, Digital Marketing & Strategy

NEW YORK, NY – July 2022

Olivia Mittleman joins Roc Nation as Associate Director, Digital Marketing & Strategy where she will drive the overall digital brand strategy to support the continued development and growth for Roc Nation’s clients on social media. She will be responsible for creating and managing the content strategy and calendar for a diverse portfolio, identifying relevant client and brand opportunities, campaign ideation, and provide actionable insights with a view to grow the clients overall digital presence. Prior to joining Roc Nation, Olivia was a Social Content Manager at the NBA. Olivia received her undergraduate degree from Sacred Heart University.

Company Background:

Roc Nation was founded by Shawn “JAY-Z” Carter in 2008 and has grown into the world’s preeminent entertainment company, working in every aspect of modern entertainment—with recording artists and producers, songwriters, and athletes. The company represents a diverse roster of recording artists, musicians, record producers and athletes. With offices in New York City, London, Nashville, Austin and Los Angeles, Roc Nation represents some of the world’s most recognizable names in music, sports, and entertainment. They are a full-service organization, supporting their diverse roster of talent via artist management, music publishing, music/film/TV production, strategic brand development and beyond. Roc Nation has forged strong partnerships with the world’s leading experts in artist / athlete management, technology, fashion, and philanthropy, and are redefining the business of entertainment.

For more information, visit Roc Nation
